channel.title: How do you change the prices of items?
channel.description: Hello, does anyone mind telling me how to change the prices of items in my NPC shops, I am kinda new at codeing. ;) Thanks!

item.title: How do you change the prices of items?
item.dc:creator: @Noobinator9907 Noobinator9907
item.description:
@Noobinator9907 wrote:

Oh really? Ok thanks d00d.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the prices of items?

item.title: How do you change the prices of items?
item.dc:creator: @cloudscape cloudscape
item.description:
@cloudscape wrote:

open up item .cfg and you look for the item you want. eg a whip and you do this,

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	200000	200000	200000	0	82	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	82	0

I belive the first 200000 is shop buy price, the second is shop sell price and the third is high alch value, not 100% of th order but this is the rough layout,

Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the prices of items?
